pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
pre_caption: This is a static scenery shot of a long, dark hallway. The corridor is illuminated by a series of wall-mounted lights that cast an eerie, greenish glow, reflecting off the dark, polished floor. White doors line the cinder block walls, and equipment like pallet jacks is scattered throughout, creating a mysterious and suspenseful atmosphere reminiscent of a secure facility or bunker.
